title: 1887 Allen & Ginter (N28) John "Monte" Ward GAI for sale
author: Archive

posts.post_title: 1887 Allen & Ginter (N28) John "Monte" Ward GAI for sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Glenn
GAI authentic N28 card of Hall of Famer John M. Ward.  Card is a little undersized (presumably trimmed),  measures 1 3/8" x 2 5/8", but displays nicely.  No wrinkles or creases.  Touch of paper loss on the back, across parts of three Billiard Players' names on the checklist.  

$325 or best offer.  Free shipping and insurance.

[IMG]http://img86.echo.cx/img86/8264/june050023xc.jpg[/IMG]
